If you like puzzles this game is for you! once you get the hang of how the portals work the puzzles are easy to figure out! it's got a good story with lots of questions. In Portal 2 more light is shed on the back round of the crazy computer and why so much testing! Portal gets your mind used to how things work, Portal 2 has a LOT more challenging puzzles! especially in the multiplayer area!! It crashed on me 1 time playing. you can finish the game in a day if you don't get stuck on a puzzle!

This is such a good game. It's has a funny narrator. It is not the hardest Puzzle game I have beat which was Machinarium which is also a great game. I would like to see a portal three made or a game not with portal, but with the F-Stop function they didn't add under a different name but with the Aperture Science place still in it. Valve gets so much money from steam and I am guessing that is one of the reasons they have not made any games for so long.
